title: Beachfront Only Vacation Rentals | Beach House Rentals California - California Beach Vacation Rentals
text: All of our California beach rentals are directly on the ocean! Whether you are looking for a charming one bedroom beach bungalow on the sand for a romantic getaway, or a twelve bedroom oceanfront luxurious mansion for your family reunion, we are sure to have the place for you! View our California vacation rentals and read why you should rent with Beachfront Only What better place to stay on the beach than in sunny Southern California! Our California beach rentals are all located in North County San Diego, which is approximately 30 minutes north of Downtown San Diego. Western North County is made up of quaint coastal towns, each with their own vibe and that laid back California beach essence that everyone loves. Our rentals are in the cities of Carlsbad, Encinitas, and Oceanside (Oceanside being the northernmost San Diego town).
